Expected Result: Submit button is disabled
Actual Result: Form is empty but the submit button was enabled

Expected Result: The first and last name don't accept having a number
Actual Result: The first and last name accept having a number

Expected Result: The first and last name don't accept having special characters
Actual Result: The first and last name accept having special characters

Expected Result: The submit button is not clickable when gender field is unselected
Actual Result: The submit button is clickable when gender field is unselected

Expected Result: The submit button should not be clickable when department field is unselected.
Actual Result: The submit button is clickable when department field is unselected

Expected Result: The username accepts a maximum length of 30 characters
Actual Result: The username accepts a maximum length more than 30 characters

Expected Result: The username doesn't accept starting with a number
Actual Result: The username accepts starting with a number

Expected Result: The username doesn't accept having a special character other than an underscore
Actual Result: The username accepts having a special character other than an underscore

Expected Result: Non-matching passwords error message is displayed
Actual Result: The passwords are not matching but no error message is displayed.

Expected Result: Maximum length requirement error message is displayed
Actual Result: Password more than required maximum length is accepted.

Expected Result: Submit button should be disabled with empty password fields
Actual Result: Submit button is enabled with empty password fields.

Expected Result: Password field should not accept pasted input
Actual Result: Password was pasted into the password field.

Expected Result: Submit button is disabled when email field is empty
Actual Result: Submit button is enabled with an empty email field

Expected Result: E-mail field type is 'text'
Actual Result: E-mail field input type is in-correct. E-mail field type is 'text'

Expected Result: Submit button is disabled when contact number field is empty.
Actual Result: Submit button is enabled with an empty contact number field.

Expected Result: Invalid contact number format error message is displayed.
Actual Result: Invalid contact number format is accepted without error.

Expected Result: Contact number field input type is 'tel'.
Actual Result: Contact number field input type is incorrect. Contact number field type is 'text' and must be 'tel'.

Expected Result: The 'Please enter your Contact No.' error message is displayed.
Actual Result: The 'Please enter your Contact No.' error message isn't displayed.

Expected Result: Maximum length should be enforced at 500 characters.
Actual Result: Maximum length restriction failed.

Expected Result: Input should be truncated to 500 characters.
Actual Result: Truncation not enforced.
